TopicTitle: Waiter, theres a _____________ in my soup!

Articles.Content:
Sshhhhhhhhllllluuuuuuuurrrrrppppppp!!

waiter, there's a RS-68 engine in my soup!

JEB! -walks into kitchen. you can hear an argument inside-

Waiter! A black hole with the mass of the universe has randomly appeared in my soup for some reason...

OH GOD--

 

Waiter, the local group has somehow wound up in my soup!
Waiter, there's a Waiter, there's a Waiter, there's a Waiter, there's a Waiter, there's a Waiter, there's a Waiter in my soup!
Waiter! There are alternate universes forming in my soup!

It explodes

Waiter! there's a kraken in my soup!

What's the problem? At least it's better than that Dres thing people yell about...

Waiter! There's a Godzilla in my soup!

Uhh, yeah. We kind of forgot to butcher it before cooking.

 

Waiter! The hell dude? Bro u serious? Wot u do to my soup m8?

Ummm....nothing?

 

Waiter, there's a school in my soup!

KILL IT WITH MATH!!1! Or… just eat it.

Waiter, legoclone09's Roflcopter has landed in my soup!

ROFL

Waiter! There's a novella in my soup!

Some books should be tasted, some devoured, but only a few should be chewed and digested thoroughly.

Waiter, there's hydrazine in my soup!

Oh, what's the remnants of what we used to cook the soup.

Waiter! This isn't even soup - this is just hot water!

Nooooooooooo. Whaaa? What are you talking about, this is totally soup... [Joe I think we should give him back his money]

Soup! There's a bowl in my waiter!

*ACK* waiter falls over

Bowl! There's a waiter in my soup!

Sorry, I'm just bathing.

Waiter! The 11th dimension is in my soup!

Here, have a Stephen Hawking to solve that!

Waiter, there's a dwarf planet end-of-school pool party in my soup! (aka a DPEOSPP. Try saying that 10 times fast!)

"Where? WHERE?! TELL ME! "

"Waiter, there's superglue in my soup!"

MM! MMMRPH MRPUH! (Struggles to open mouth)

Waiter, there's a horse riding a horse riding a horse in my soup!

That is because the animal crackers are stacked neatly, and they were only selling horse-shaped ones at the store.

Waiter! There is a Civ 5 Battle Royale Mk II Part 56 in my soup!

Huh? I've no idea as to what that is...

Waiter! There's a Wonder Ball in my soup!

Why is that a bad thing?

Waiter, a man claiming to be the real waiter has just angrily knocked over my soup bowl!

GUARDS!

Waiter, there appears to be a particle accelerator in my soup!

Yeah, we ran out of gas, so this is the only semi-non-toxic way to beat your soup. Just don't press the big red button.

Waiter! There's a 1000 lbs man in my soup!! How this is possible, I don't know.

You see, what we did is... *proceeds to explain how he put the guy into your soup, not understanding that that is the least of your concerns*

 

Waiter! Is this broth, or is this UDMH?
